item.description:
Hi Everyone,
This is a new put in area for a familiar place and a more secluded Barbie-Q area.

RAIN OR BAD WEATHER CANCELS THE EVENT.

WEATHER= ? TOO SOON TO TELL.

All the yaks are reserved at this time.


Bring some food..its a SIMPLE POTLUCK outing also right by the river after the paddle......Bring chairs..and whatever else you like to sit around on.
The grill is loaded and ready.


Getting there:
From Hartford: take I 84 east to exit 59 onto I - 384 east.... When I 384 ends at rte 6 and 44..take the left split = rte 44 east....go for 7.8 miles (just past Mansfield Depot) and turn right onto rte 32 (Stafford Rd) go apx 0.36 miles then take a right on to PLAINS RD
Go about 0.25 miles just past the RR tracks and take a right into the parking area just before the River Bridge.



Kayaks available: Paddle & PDF with whistle included,

Dougnation of 15 bucks for the kayak rented for this particular event.

Please make sure you are familiar with the yak you choose.

I will only bring the yaks that are confirmed by a yes and by persons i have some familiarity with..
Sorry i don't like to leave un-attended yaks on the trailer.


The Brown Homeless Bathtub, Recreational Kayak= Pungo 12' with F/R floataion bags installed= AGNES


The Blue Flipper & Dipper, Sea Kayak= Riot Tourlite 15'= Al-r

The Yellow Bananna Snake, Sea Kayak= Cobra Expidition SOT 18', = BILL

The Red Wild Dancer, Sea Kayak= Eddyline Wind Dancer 18'= ????

The Red Flat Boat, Sea Kayak= NDK Greenlander Pro 18'= Alex

Ok see ya all there.
al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Look for ORANGE STRIPED TRAFFIC CONES @ parking lot

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: KAYAK EVENT @ WILLIMANTIC RIVER, Plains Rd, (Eagleville Pond Area) & Barbie-Q
